thread.title: Travel: Further delays and cancellations on Virgin East Coast
thread.title_full: Travel: Further delays and cancellations on Virgin East Coast | Tyne Tees - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Travel: Further delays and cancellations on Virgin East Coast
text:
Virgin Trains East Coast are encouraging passengers to check before they travel today. There are ongoing disruptions to the service.
Virgin Trains EC @Virgin_TrainsEC Follow #VTECUpdate Please check http://t.co/9X4YG7cv1c before travelling for info on recent cancellations and delays.
12:22 - 24 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Virgin Trains EC @Virgin_TrainsEC Follow #VTECUpdate After safety checks, the 14.15 Leeds - King's Cross is cancelled. Further service info can be found at http://t.co/9X4YG7cv1c .
12:10 - 24 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Virgin Trains EC @Virgin_TrainsEC Follow #VTECUpdate The 12.35 King's Cross - Leeds service will now be cancelled following safety checks that were made earlier.
11:30 - 24 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Virgin Trains EC @Virgin_TrainsEC Follow #VTECUpdate really sorry for the delays and disruption today. Anyone affected over 30 mins can claim Delay Repay at http://t.co/PUDk5Lti6A .
11:14 - 24 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Thu 24 Sep 2015 Travel Virgin Trains East Coast Main Line
